CustomField.description: Formula field to populate Bill To Address onto the Invoice from Billing Address object.
CustomField.formula: Bill_To_Address3__r.Billing_Street__c & IF(ISBLANK( Bill_To_Address3__r.Billing_City__c ), '', BR()) & Bill_To_Address3__r.Billing_City__c & IF(ISBLANK( Bill_To_Address3__r.Billing_City__c ), '', ', ') & Bill_To_Address3__r.Billing_State__c & ' ' & Bill_To_Address3__r.Billing_Zipcode__c
CustomField.label: Bill To Address
